query: CREATE TABLE pred_tab (a int NOT NULL, b int, c int NOT NULL)
expected: CREATE TABLE pred_tab (a INT NOT NULL, b INT, c INT NOT NULL)

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.a IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.a IS NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.b IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.b IS NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.a IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.a IS NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.b IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.b IS NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.a IS NOT NULL OR t.b = 1
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.a IS NOT NULL OR t.b = 1

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.b IS NOT NULL OR t.a = 1
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.b IS NOT NULL OR t.a = 1

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.a IS NULL OR t.c IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.a IS NULL OR t.c IS NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t WHERE t.b IS NULL OR t.c IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t WHERE t.b IS NULL OR t.c IS NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a IS NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 FULL JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a = t2.a LEFT JOIN pred_tab t3 ON t2.a IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 FULL OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a = t2.a LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t3 ON t2.a IS NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a IS NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a = 1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t3 ON t2.a IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t3 ON t2.a IS NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a IS NOT NULL OR t2.b = 1
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a IS NOT NULL OR t2.b = 1

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 FULL JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a = t2.a LEFT JOIN pred_tab t3 ON t2.a IS NOT NULL OR t2.b = 1
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 FULL OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a = t2.a LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t3 ON t2.a IS NOT NULL OR t2.b = 1

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON (t1.a IS NULL OR t1.c IS NULL)
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON (t1.a IS NULL OR t1.c IS NULL)

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON t1.a = 1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t3 ON t2.a IS NULL OR t2.c IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON t1.a = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t3 ON t2.a IS NULL OR t2.c IS NULL

query: DROP TABLE pred_tab
CREATE TABLE pred_parent (a int)
expected: CREATE TABLE pred_parent (a INT)

query: CREATE TABLE pred_child () INHERITS (pred_parent)
ALTER TABLE ONLY pred_parent ALTER a SET NOT NULL
expected: ALTER TABLE ONLY pred_parent ALTER COLUMN a SET NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_parent WHERE a IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_parent WHERE a IS NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_parent WHERE a IS NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_parent WHERE a IS NULL

query: ALTER TABLE pred_parent ALTER a DROP NOT NULL
expected: ALTER TABLE pred_parent ALTER COLUMN a DROP NOT NULL

query: ALTER TABLE pred_child ALTER a SET NOT NULL
expected: ALTER TABLE pred_child ALTER COLUMN a SET NOT NULL

query: DROP TABLE pred_parent, pred_child
CREATE TABLE pred_tab (a int, b int)
expected: CREATE TABLE pred_tab (a INT, b INT)

query: CREATE TABLE pred_tab_notnull (a int, b int NOT NULL)
expected: CREATE TABLE pred_tab_notnull (a INT, b INT NOT NULL)

query: INSERT INTO pred_tab VALUES (1, 1)
INSERT INTO pred_tab VALUES (2, 2)
INSERT INTO pred_tab_notnull VALUES (2, 2)
INSERT INTO pred_tab_notnull VALUES (3, 3)
ANALYZE pred_tab
ANALYZE pred_tab_notnull
EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON TRUE LEFT JOIN pred_tab_notnull t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT JOIN pred_tab t4 ON t3.b IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON TRUE LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab_notnull AS t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t4 ON t3.b IS NOT NULL

query: SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON TRUE LEFT JOIN pred_tab_notnull t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT JOIN pred_tab t4 ON t3.b IS NOT NULL
expected: SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON TRUE LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab_notnull AS t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t4 ON t3.b IS NOT NULL

query: EXPLAIN (COSTS OFF) SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON TRUE LEFT JOIN pred_tab_notnull t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT JOIN pred_tab t4 ON t3.b IS NULL AND t3.a IS NOT NULL
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON TRUE LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab_notnull AS t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t4 ON t3.b IS NULL AND t3.a IS NOT NULL

query: SELECT * FROM pred_tab t1 LEFT JOIN pred_tab t2 ON TRUE LEFT JOIN pred_tab_notnull t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT JOIN pred_tab t4 ON t3.b IS NULL AND t3.a IS NOT NULL
expected: SELECT * FROM pred_tab AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t2 ON TRUE LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab_notnull AS t3 ON t2.a = t3.a LEFT OUTER JOIN pred_tab AS t4 ON t3.b IS NULL AND t3.a IS NOT NULL

query: DROP TABLE pred_tab_notnull
